list_definition.definition: a kind of hard, usually highly polished stone, cold to the touch

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This table is made of marble

list_definition.definition: a small hard ball of glass used in children’s games

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The little boy rolled a marble along the ground.
